result.title: 6 Thematic learning events on energy efficiency finance
result.description: 6 Thematic learning events on energy efficiency finance to address key aspects that can help accelerating energy efficiency investments in the direct countries Poland, Latvia and Denmark as well as across the entire Baltic Sea Region (BSR). The learning events will explore the specific challenges and solutions of the host region and to the extent appropriate the prospects of replication.

result.title: 5 case studies of intervention achievements per region
